snippet: Aaron Hernandez has hired the lawyer who famously won an acquittal for Florida mom Casey Anthony to represent him in his upcoming double-murder trial....
lead_paragraph: Aaron Hernandez has hired the lawyer who famously won an acquittal for Florida mom Casey Anthony to represent him in his upcoming double-murder trial.

headline.main: Aaron Hernandez Hires Casey Anthony Attorney Jose Baez
headline.print_headline: Aaron Hernandez Hires Casey Anthony Attorney Jose Baez
